oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-01-11 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from January 11, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ferlin Husky (host/performer), guest performer Kitty Wells with Ray Crisp and Joe Zinkan, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 953rd broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ferlin Husky; Rod Brasfield; Kitty Wells; Ray Crisp; Joe Zinkan; Tommy Jackson; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Ferlin Husky -- Wang Dang Doo (Ferlin Husky) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Ferlin Husky) -- Ferlin Husky introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Ferlin Husky) -- Ferlin Husky introduces Kitty Wells -- I Can't Stop Loving You (Kitty Wells, Ray Crisp, Joe Zinkan) -- Prince Albert commercial (Rod Brasfield, Ferlin Husky) -- Ferlin Husky introduces Tommy Jackson -- Here And There (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Ferlin Husky talks -- I Saw The Light (Ferlin Husky) -- Ferlin Husky introduces Chet Atkins -- Muskrat Ramble (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Husky, Ferlin; Wells, Kitty; Crisp, Ray; Zinkan, Joe
